thrasthawadaya thrasthawadaya lesa dakima thaba thrasthawadaya pilibanda saba nirwachanayak pawa owunta thibune natha.welupille pirabaharan thrasthawadiyaku lesa handinwimata mali wu me balawathun palasthina nayaka yasar arfath handinwuye thrasthawadiyaku lesini. 9/11 praharayen dashakayak sampurna wi athath, lokaya antharjathika thrasthawadaya nisa darunu lesa pida windimin athath adata da eksath jathinge sanwidhanayata pawa thrasthawadaya pilibanda pahadili nirwachanayak natha.eheth, loka sithiyame kudawata satahanwa athi rajyayak menma, lowa mlechchathama ha ashishtama pamanak nowa pabala, guwan ha nawika yana ansha thunema balayak godanangagena siti thrasthawadi sanwidhanaya samanga satan kala shri lankawata thrasthawadaya pilibanda niwaradi nirwachanayak thibini.2005 di balayata pathwimen pasu mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma da sama kalapiya ha jagath wedikawakadima penwadimata wayam kale thrasthawadaya - thrasthawadaya lesa mita an widhiyakin therum ganima niwaradi nowana bawayi’ kopamana us handin kiyasitiyada eya thrasthawadaya lesa nirwachanaya kara ganimata adhirajyawadi balawathunta awashya wuye natha.
